```{r}
#| eval: false
devtools::install_github("bartonicek/plotscaper")
```

## Read in the data

```{r}

imdb <- read.csv("imdb1000.csv")
dplyr::glimpse(imdb)

```

## Explore

```{r}
#| fig-width: 9.5
#| fig-height: 9.5

library(plotscaper)

create_schema(imdb) |> 
  add_scatterplot(c("runtime", "votes"), list(queries = c("title"))) |>
  add_barplot(c("director")) |>
  add_histogram(c("runtime")) |>
  add_fluctplot(c("genre1", "genre2")) |>
  render()


```
